title: Maskiss 25-Pairs 24K Gold Under Eye Patches/Masks for Puffy Eyes, Dark Circles and Puffiness, Collagen Skin Care Products
descriptions:
Maskiss 24K Gold Under Eye Patches – simple care for tired eyes.

What it is:
- A box of 25 pairs of soft gel patches you place under your eyes.
- Made with Collagen, 24K Nano Gold, and Hyaluronic Acid.
- Gentle, made from natural plant extracts, and suitable for all skin types.

What it helps with:
- Reduces puffiness and bags under the eyes.
- Softens the look of fine lines and wrinkles.
- Lightens dark circles.
- Adds moisture so skin feels smooth and comfortable.
- Supports skin’s natural collagen for a fresher look.

Easy steps to use:
1) Wash your face with warm water and gently pat dry.
2) Place one patch under each eye.
3) Press lightly so they sit well on the skin.
4) Leave on for 20 minutes.
5) Remove and softly pat in any leftover serum—do not rinse.

How often:
- Use twice a day for faster results, or at least once a week if you prefer a simple routine.

Good to know:
- Safe and gentle with no known side effects.
- Works for women and men.
- Great for morning puffiness or evening relaxation.

In short:
If your eyes look tired or puffy, these easy-to-use patches give quick comfort and a refreshed look. Just place, wait 20 minutes, and enjoy smoother, brighter under-eyes.
